title: Bug 14197: Changes Occur Immediately Upon Removing Working Set
description: When removing a working set, changes take effect immediately.
OB: Upon removing a working set, changes to the package view occur instantly, without any confirmation or delay.
EB: Changes should not be applied immediately upon removing a working set. There should be a confirmation prompt or a delay before the changes take effect.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it; observe that the package view is filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first one.
